CustomField.formula: Is_Falcon__c =false && SchedStartTime >= (NOW() - 6/24) && SchedStartTime <= (NOW() + 1) && ISPICKVAL(Status, "Dispatched") && (SLA_Name__c = "4hr" || SLA_Name__c = "8hr" || SLA_Name__c = "2hr Repair" || SLA_Name__c = "CBUD E After Hours" || SLA_Name__c = "2hr" || SLA_Name__c = "3hr" || SLA_Name__c = "CBUD E" || SLA_Name__c = "6hr" || SLA_Name__c = "5 Business Hours")
CustomField.label: MTTR Late to be Accepted
